Congratulations! You have now become a proud Dark Elf Bladedancer. Life as a Bladedancer may still be unfamiliar, but do not be anxious -- you can learn what you need to know one step at a time from the masters nearby.
May you dedicate yourself to swordplay and never stray from Shilen's service. Congratulations once again!
Our guild has prepared this small gift to assist you in your journey. Take this to the Grand Master, Grand Magister, Master Trainer or High Priest who permits transfers in any major town and you will be able to exchange it for a usable Shadow Weapon.
